name: Ratchet & Clank Collection
description:
Two bold heroes on three epic adventures! Take a rocket-fuelled ride back to the start of Ratchet and Clank’s intergalactic saga and battle classic enemies across the universe in the duo’s first three smash-hit missions.

This collection includes:

• Ratchet & Clank™
Join the heroic duo on their very first adventure and stop the dastardly Chairman Drek from blasting the galaxy to bits.

• Ratchet & Clank: Going Commando™
Hot on the heels of a shadowy thief, Ratchet and Clank must leap between planets and fight off space goons before a mysterious mutant force devours the universe.

• Ratchet & Clank: Up Your Arsenal™
Foil Dr Nefarious’ evil plot to wipe out all organic life from the cosmos.

1 player(s)
20480KB Minimum
